sent_inference: I enjoy going sailing with my father.
I don't like eating out at upscale places.
Two of the students were tired.
The cookie was chocolate or oatmeal.
Some of the players were skillful.
sent_context: John and Bob were talking about sailing yesterday.
John and Bob were talking about restaurants yesterday.
A year ago, Bob and John were talking about the students in a class they taught.
A few days ago, John and Bob were talking about a particular cookie at a local bakery.
Last week, John and Bob were talking about the football game.
Last month, Bob and John were talking about the selection of shirts at a local store.
Bob and John were talking about the previous weekend.
Yesterday, John and Bob were talking about a movie at the local theater.
expt_aim: To see how we judged those sentences.
